Capabilities - Annotation Type in net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations
Methods marked with Capabilities are queried by PluginInformation.
CLASSPATH - Static variable in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri.ClassURI
Means we should add all plugins we have in our classpath
CLASSPATH(String) - Static method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri.ClassURI
Specifies a pattern to add from the current classpath.
ClassURI - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri
Convenience method to load plugins from the classpath
ClassURI(Class<? extends Plugin>) - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri.ClassURI
Construct a new class URI for the given class.
ConfigurationFile - Annotation Type in net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.configuration
Specifies a configuration file relative to the given plugin.
contains(Class<? extends T>) - Method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.OptionUtils

containsAny(Class<? extends T>...) - Method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.OptionUtils

createPluginManager() - Static method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl.PluginManagerFactory
Creates a new PluginManager, no user configuration is used.
createPluginManager(Properties) - Static method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl.PluginManagerFactory
Creates a new PluginManager with a supplied user configuration.
createPluginManagerX() - Static method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl.PluginManagerFactory
Creates a new PluginManager which will be wrapped in a PluginManagerUtil object, no user configuration is used.
createPluginManagerX(Properties) - Static method in class net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl.PluginManagerFactory
Creates a new PluginManager, wrapped in a PluginManagerUtil object, with a supplied user configuration.
